title.text: Victorian electorate voting preferences by two preferred candiate (2PC)

tooltip.signal: {"DivisionName": isValid(datum["DivisionName"]) ? datum["DivisionName"] : ""+datum["DivisionName"], "First Preferred Candidate": isValid(datum["PartyAbA"]) ? datum["PartyAbA"] : ""+datum["PartyAbA"], "FPC Votes": format(datum["PreferenceVotesA"], ""), "Second Preferred Candidate": isValid(datum["PartyAbB"]) ? datum["PartyAbB"] : ""+datum["PartyAbB"], "SPC Votes": format(datum["PreferenceVotesB"], ""), "vote Population": format(datum["votePopulation"], ""), "Elected Party": isValid(datum["winningParty"]) ? datum["winningParty"] : ""+datum["winningParty"], "Percentage of Total Votes": format(datum["percentageVotes"], ".2f")}

description.signal: "winningParty: " + (isValid(datum["winningParty"]) ? datum["winningParty"] : ""+datum["winningParty"]) + "; DivisionName: " + (isValid(datum["DivisionName"]) ? datum["DivisionName"] : ""+datum["DivisionName"]) + "; First Preferred Candidate: " + (isValid(datum["PartyAbA"]) ? datum["PartyAbA"] : ""+datum["PartyAbA"]) + "; FPC Votes: " + (format(datum["PreferenceVotesA"], "")) + "; Second Preferred Candidate: " + (isValid(datum["PartyAbB"]) ? datum["PartyAbB"] : ""+datum["PartyAbB"]) + "; SPC Votes: " + (format(datum["PreferenceVotesB"], "")) + "; vote Population: " + (format(datum["votePopulation"], "")) + "; Elected Party: " + (isValid(datum["winningParty"]) ? datum["winningParty"] : ""+datum["winningParty"]) + "; Percentage of Total Votes: " + (format(datum["percentageVotes"], ".2f"))
